site_title: Love is in the Air by Francis Ow

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This origami Plane is one of a kind. It is a flying heart! Perfect for sending you love on St-Valentine. This is Love Is In the Air by Francis Ow. The 40th member of our 100 Exotic Paper airplane challenge. Enjoy! If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 039 : Imaginary Voyage by Didier Boursin", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/IDhXmGABL_k Love is in the Air by Francis Ow Tutorial Timeline: 0:00 Demonstration 0:13 Start Folding 1:00 Folding the Body of the Heart 1:38 Rounding the Top of the Heart 2:45 Folding the Heart Shape Paper Airplane in Half 2:50 How to Throw Thanks For Watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art

block_list.body:
